My most sincere condolences go out to Dr. Richard Izquierdo’s family as we mourn the news of his death. Richard was a friend who dedicated his life to providing quality healthcare to those who needed it the most in #TheBronx and beyond.

En Puerto Rico, el acceso a Medicare, Medicaid, Head Start y otros programas federales también están en juego en el Censo 2020. La isla ha sido devastado por el Huracán María, terremotos y el Coronavirus, es crucial que todos los boricuas se hagan contar.

Puerto Rico’s access to Medicare, Medicaid, and other federal programs is also at stake in the #2020Census. The island has been devastated by Hurricane Maria, earthquakes, & the coronavirus, it is crucial that they count in this census.

Things at stake in the #2020Census include:
 
- Over a trillion dollars in federal funding for housing, food, healthcare
- Determination of Congressional seats by state
-Say in who leads political institutions
- Countless policy and business decisions made based on Census data
Early voting is happening in #NYC’s local elections for the first time this year. Make sure to grab your mask and head out to vote, find your nearest voting location here: https://t.co/cmL6JBkPhO

We need to take seriously the inequities exposed by this virus, & the failures that made it so devastating. And, Trump must be held accountable for the failed leadership of his Administration. We need to fight for #TheBronx & communities across the nation to overcome this.

Yesterday, our nation marked the loss of 100,000 lives from the #CoronavirusPandemic. More than 4,400 of those victims were from #TheBronx. We remember them and the lives they led before this devastation.

#TheBronx is the epicenter of the #CoronavirusPandemic in the US. No other part of the country has been hit as hard as our community has. This is not the time to waste money on building a prison in the middle of a residential area that the people of #TheBronx oppose. https://t.co/ZnwSewSL0p
The bill would protect the 3.2 million American citizens residing in Puerto Rico by guaranteeing funding for essential public services such as education, public safety, healthcare, & pensions.

The #CARESAct:

▶️ Expands unemployment insurance benefits
▶️ Invests billions in Small Business Relief
▶️ Supports Our Hospitals, Health Care Workers & Health Research
